description.value:
Factory-Made

You are a work of artifice, a walking facsimile of the beings of this world - but the pain and emotions you feel are no less real. You were purpose-built as a fully formed individual and are now left to seek an understanding of the world and your place in it.

Artificial Fortitude. You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.X1BC9SGRNGDE0QQ8]{Artificial Fortitude}

Inorganic. You don't experience the same needs as other beings. You do not need to eat, drink, or breathe, and are immune to disease. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.6DATIW24FE1HJRQW]{Inorganic}

Specialized Design. Up to one of the tools you are proficienct with due to your Profession is integrated into your body (chosen during character creation). @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.GJEHOH9FUM9N0G8E]{Specialized Design}

Languages. Common.
